item.title: Report X-2024120103
item.description:
Report X-2024120103

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-04T12:24:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-21
  • City: MEMPHIS
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On November 21st a package was discovered leaking during the AM sort. The package contained a drum that contained UN1988, ALDEHYDES FLAMMABLE TOXIC NOS, 3(6.1), III. It appears that the leak occurred at the closure of the drum. The drum was placed into a steel salvage drum and an amended shippers declaration was requested.
